name: ReCharger
description:
Fight off against AI drivers and lead the scoreboard with the best kill count to win the match.

Mechanics

Use REVERSE to wind up your ReCharger vehicle. 
More CHARGE, means more SPEED and DESTRUCTION power!

Top up your DURABILITY with    health canisters. 

Instantly max your SPEED with  energy packs. 

Controls

Keyboard

S / Down - Reverse
A, D / Left , Right - Steering
Left Shift - Look Behind
T - Change Music Track

Controller

Right Stick (Pull Down)- Reverse
Left Stick (Left, Right)- Steering
Left Button - Look Behind
Y button - Change Music Track

Info

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme "Rewind."

Took me 3 days to think and plan for this concept and used the remaining time to develop the current version.

Gameplay & design was inspired by games like Twisted Metal and Sonic All-Stars Racing. To see more games & updates, you can follow me on my social media below:

 Twitter @polysplitgames

 Facebook @polysplitgames

Thanks & Rock on!

Notice: current version has score system issues, it will be fixed in the future after the game jam. Thank you for your understanding!
